events.message: We have successfully received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate.
The candidate's application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department as developer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the hiring process for the software engineer position.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call and showed strong technical knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 20th at 3 PM with the senior developer.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills.
An HR interview is scheduled for May 23rd to discuss company culture and benefits with the candidate.
The candidate had a positive HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and role details.
